author: Koimoi.Com Team
title: When Farhan Akhtar Buried Himself In Sand For The Fakir of Venice
text: tweet Farhan Akhtar’s next: In “ The Fakir of Venice ” the most memorable part was when Farhan did the burial himself for the film. They did not use a double, he literally went under the sand himself and was buried under for all of 2 whole minutes. When Farhan did the burial himself in his next “The Fakir of Venice” When Farhan Akhtar did the burial himself in his next “The Fakir of Venice” So what he did made the scene more believable, more serious , more everything and he did not have to do that. This black comedy drama film also stars Annu Kapoor and Kamal Sidhu in pivotal roles. SHARE
